statements: DELETE FROM lighting_patterns WHERE pattern_id = 100 AND date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM lighting_patterns WHERE energy_consumption > 50 AND time < '12:00:00';
DELETE FROM lighting_patterns WHERE room_id = 5 AND pattern_name = 'Rainbow';
DELETE FROM lighting_patterns WHERE pattern_duration > 10 AND room_id = 1;
DELETE FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_result < 0.5 AND trend_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM lighting_patterns WHERE location = 'Living Room' AND intensity > 50;
DELETE FROM energy_efficiency WHERE efficiency_rating <= 3.0 AND trend_id = '7b9b6550-55cb-4523-85b2-9a8469a0f7a7';
